Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CIN developed in 25 . 5 % patients who underwent chemotherapy and in 11 % patients who did not ( P = 0 . 1 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CIN |

Explanation:

CIN (Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia) is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a precancerous condition of the cervix and is often caused by Human Papillomavirus (HPV) infection. In this context, the paragraph mentions the occurrence of CIN in patients who underwent chemotherapy and those who did not.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CIN |

Explanation:

The only term in the paragraph that clearly refers to a "Disease" is CIN (Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia). The other terms such as "chemotherapy" and "P = 0.1" do not refer to diseases, so they are not included in the table.
